title: Piedade
body: Piedade is a populated place in the parish of Jardim do Mar, where the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Piedade with an adjacent manor is located, belonging to the entailed estate of the Coutos Cardosos family. It was established in 1730 by the trustee Jo達o do Couto Cardoso and rebuilt by his successor Francisco Jo達o de Vasconcelos de Couto Cardoso in 1825.
